```{r}
setwd("~/Desktop/Crypto_Analysis-master")
source("check_packages.R")
check_packages(c("dplyr","plyr", "scales", "sjPlot"))
load("coin_list.Rda")

dates = list()

dates[[1]] = filter(coin.list, date == "2017-02-10") %>% dplyr::rename(price_2017_02_10 = price) %>% select(-date)
dates[[2]] = filter(coin.list, date == "2017-08-10") %>% dplyr::rename(price_2017_08_10 = price) %>% select(-date)
dates[[3]] = filter(coin.list, date == "2017-10-10") %>% dplyr::rename(price_2017_10_10 = price) %>% select(-date)
dates[[4]] = filter(coin.list, date == "2017-12-10") %>% dplyr::rename(price_2017_12_10 = price) %>% select(-date)
dates[[5]] = filter(coin.list, date == "2018-01-10") %>% dplyr::rename(price_2018_01_10 = price) %>% select(-date)
dates[[6]] = filter(coin.list, date == "2018-02-01") %>% dplyr::rename(price_2018_02_01 = price) %>% select(-date)
dates[[7]] = filter(coin.list, date == "2018-02-10") %>% dplyr::rename(price_2018_02_10 = price) %>% select(-date)

price_history_df = join_all(dates, by =c("symbol","name","ranknow"), type = 'full') %>%
    mutate(one_year = percent( (price_2018_02_10 - price_2017_02_10) / price_2017_02_10)) %>%
    mutate(six_months = percent((price_2018_02_10 - price_2017_08_10) / price_2017_08_10)) %>%
        mutate(four_months = percent((price_2018_02_10 - price_2017_10_10) / price_2017_10_10)) %>%
        mutate(two_months = percent( (price_2018_02_10 - price_2017_12_10) / price_2017_12_10 )) %>%
                mutate(one_month = percent((price_2018_02_10 - price_2018_01_10) / price_2018_01_10)) %>%
            mutate(ten_days = percent((price_2018_02_10 - price_2018_02_01) / price_2018_02_01)) %>%
    select(name, one_year, six_months, four_months, two_months, one_month, ten_days)
    price_history_df[price_history_df=="NA%"] <- ""


sjPlot::tab_df(price_history_df)

```
